thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Blanca Blanco suffers wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Oscars 2017: Blanca Blanco suffers wardrobe malfunction | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The actress added inches to her height with high-heeled black sandals with tiny bows on the ankle strap. Very revealing: While the gown's voluminous short sleeves and shoulder ruffles sought to detract the eye, it's unlikely they succeeded Leggy: The dress decorated with leaf motifs emphasized her waist with a shiny belt and she added inches to her height with high-heeled black sandals with tiny bows on the ankle straps Blanco wore her raven hair with an off-center parting and pulled back from her face with just one teasing tendril left loose at the front. She added a large statement swirly ring on her left hand forefinger and diamond earrings. Her finishing touch was a silver clutch with a gold clasp. Decked out: Blanco, 27,added a large statement swirly ring on her left hand forefinger and diamond earrings. Her finishing touch was a silver clutch with a gold clasp 89TH ACADEMY AWARDS NOMINEES MOTION PICTURE OF THE YEAR Arrival
